The Lord gave direction to his disciples if they were not received in one city to go to another. The same counsel he would have his children now follow. If God's peculiar people can have no influence in a city because it is given to pride and idolatry, if they cannot fully do the will of God, 
                                                                           182
there are other towns, villages, and cities to which they can flee, where their surroundings may be less objectionable.
